display.label: Retrieves a list of smart collections. Note: As of version 2019-10, this endpoint implements pagination by using links that are provided in the response header. To learn more, see Making requests to paginated REST Admin API endpoints.

properties.description:
The number of results to show.
                  (default: 50, maximum: 250)
properties.label: Limit
properties.name: limit

properties.description: Show only the smart collections specified by a comma-separated list of IDs.
properties.label: Ids
properties.name: ids

properties.description: Restrict results to after the specified ID.
properties.label: Since_id
properties.name: since_id

properties.description: Show smart collections with the specified title.
properties.label: Title
properties.name: title

properties.description: Show smart collections that includes the specified product.
properties.label: Product_id
properties.name: product_id

properties.description: Filter results by smart collection handle.
properties.label: Handle
properties.name: handle

properties.description: Show smart collections last updated after this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)
properties.label: Updated_at_min
properties.name: updated_at_min

properties.description: Show smart collections last updated before this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)
properties.label: Updated_at_max
properties.name: updated_at_max

properties.description: Show smart collections published after this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)
properties.label: Published_at_min
properties.name: published_at_min

properties.description: Show smart collections published before this date. (format: 2014-04-25T16:15:47-04:00)
properties.label: Published_at_max
properties.name: published_at_max

properties.description:
Filter results based on the published status of smart collections.
                  (default: any)
                    
                        published: Show only published smart collections.
                        unpublished: Show only unpublished smart collections.
                        any: Show all smart collections.
properties.label: Published_status
properties.name: published_status

properties.description: Show only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of field names.
properties.label: Fields
properties.name: fields
